general.name: spZline_coadd
general.short: Contains a summary of the Spectro-1D spZline output for custom coadded spectra.
general.description: Contains a summary of the Spectro-1D spZline output for custom coadded spectra with line measurements

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another
